confirmTitle.description: Title of modal used to confirm the user wishes to report the email

confirmMessage.message: Are you sure you want to report this email as phishing?
confirmMessage.description: Message placed in modal content used to confirm the user wishes to report the email

confirmPrimaryButton.description: Text for modal button that confirms the user wants to report the email as phishing.

confirmCancelButton.description: Text for the button that cancels the report phish action

forwardReportBody.message: Possible phishing email reported. You can find the email attached.
forwardReportBody.description: If the extension is configured to forward reports to an address, this is the body of the email sent. The report will be attached.

forwardReportSubject.description: The subject prefix to include in phishing reports sent to a configured inbox.
